00044 QWidget* ResultateDelegate::createEditor(QWidget *parent,
00045             const QStyleOptionViewItem &option,
00046             const QModelIndex &index) const
00047     {
00048         if(index.column() == Kategorie){
00049                 QComboBox *editor = new QComboBox(parent);
00050                 QStringList list;
00051                 QSqlQuery query("SELECT name FROM kategorien");
00052                 query.exec();
00053                 for(int i=0;i<query.numRowsAffected();++i){
00054                         query.next();
00055                         list.append(query.value(0).toString());
00056                 }
00057                 editor->addItems(list);
00058                 return editor;
00059         }
00060         if(index.column() == Eintrag ||
00061            index.column() == Startzeit ||
00062            index.column() == Endzeit){
00063                 QDateTimeEdit *editor = new QDateTimeEdit(parent);
00064             editor->setDisplayFormat("dd.MM.yyyy hh:mm:ss");
00065             editor->setCalendarPopup(true);
00066             return editor;
00067         }
00068         if(index.column() == Fahrzeit){
00069                 QTimeEdit *editor = new QTimeEdit(parent);
00070                 editor->setDisplayFormat("hh:mm:ss");
00071                 editor->setCalendarPopup(false);
00072                 return editor;
00073         }
00074         QLineEdit *editor = new QLineEdit(parent);
00075         return editor;
00076     }
00080    void ResultateDelegate::setEditorData(QWidget *editor,
00081                 const QModelIndex &index) const {
00082         QLineEdit *edit = qobject_cast<QLineEdit *>(editor);
00083         QDateTimeEdit *dateEditor = qobject_cast<QDateTimeEdit *>(editor);
00084         QComboBox *comboEditor = qobject_cast<QComboBox *>(editor);
00085         QTimeEdit *timeEditor = qobject_cast<QTimeEdit *>(editor);
00086         if (edit) {
00087                 edit->setText(index.model()->data(index, Qt::EditRole).toString());
00088         } else if (dateEditor) {
00089                 dateEditor->setDateTime(index.model()->data(index, Qt::EditRole).toDateTime());
00090                 if(index.column() == Fahrzeit)
00091                         timeEditor->setTime(index.model()->data(index, Qt::EditRole).toTime());
00092         } else if (comboEditor) {
00093                 comboEditor->setCurrentIndex(
00094                                 comboEditor->findText(
00095                                                 index.model()->data(
00096                                                                 index, Qt::EditRole).toString()));
00097         }
00098     }
00102     void ResultateDelegate::setModelData(QWidget *editor, QAbstractItemModel *model,
00103         const QModelIndex &index) const
00104     {
00105         QLineEdit *edit = qobject_cast<QLineEdit *>(editor);
00106         QDateTimeEdit *dateEditor = qobject_cast<QDateTimeEdit *>(editor);
00107         QComboBox *comboEditor = qobject_cast<QComboBox *>(editor);
00108         if (edit) {
00109             model->setData(index, edit->text());
00110         }
00111         else if (dateEditor) {
00112                 model->setData(index, dateEditor->dateTime());
00113                 if(index.column() == Fahrzeit)
00114                         model->setData(index, dateEditor->time());
00115         } else if (comboEditor) {
00116             model->setData(index,comboEditor->currentText());
00117         } 
00118     }
